body:
Updated geopm package up until version 1.0.0-RC1
'1.0.0-rc1', '0.6.1', '0.6.0', '0.5.1' 

hwloc dependency was removed after 0.5.1, but remains included for backwards (and forwards) compatibility.
The option to enable/disable hwloc is only used for v0.5.1. and earlier during configure time.
Otherwise --disable-hwloc is always specified and configure warns about the option being specified.
title: Package/geopm
